intro: Sinocrassula yunnanensis, commonly known as the Yunnan sinocrassula, is a species of flowering plant in the family Crassulaceae. It is a small, succulent shrub native to China, specifically found in the Yunnan province. The plant is characterized by its dense, compact growth habit and fleshy, gray-green leaves. It produces small, star-shaped flowers that are typically pink or white, blooming in late spring. Sinocrassula yunnanensis is well adapted to rocky and arid environments, making it a hardy and resilient plant.
